summary:
Me, writing on my phone: Caleb and-
My phone: Nott. 
Me: Veth. 
My phone: Beth! 
Me: No-
My phone: NOTT! 
Me: No damnit, it's...
body:
Me, writing on my phone: Caleb and-

My phone: Nott. 

Me: Veth. 

My phone: Beth! 

Me: No-

My phone: NOTT! 

Me: No damnit, it’s Veth this time! 

My phone: … What the fuck is a Veth?!

body:

summary: honestly it’s so funny that nobody’s cast speak with animals or comprehend languages on frumpkin. i mean he’s not a cat, he’s...
body: honestly it’s so funny that nobody’s cast speak with animals or comprehend languages on frumpkin. i mean he’s not a cat, he’s fae. for all we know caleb widogast could’ve teamed up with the actual fae king unknowingly. he could have all the secrets of the universe in his little cat brain. want to learn dunimancy? ask frumpkin. want to end the war? ask frumpkin. want to tell your friends you love them without actually Saying The L Word? ask frumpkin, who will roll his eyes and produce the long-suffering sigh of an ancient god forced to watch you suppress your feelings for a year (but will comply because he loves you). you think nott is the team parent? You Fool. You Utter Buffoon. it’s fucking frumpkin, voiced by danny devito. and nobody knows, because nobody can communicate with him past caleb’s empathy link. he has to watch His Boy grow up in silence, knowing he has the knowledge to help but unable (or unwilling) to give it. frumpkin is too powerful. frumpkin is the Lexon. frumpkin is artagan. frumpkin is exandria’s detective pikachu.

You Fool. You Utter Buffoon. it’s fucking frumpkin, voiced by danny devito. and nobody knows, because nobody can communicate with him past caleb’s empathy link. he has to watch His Boy grow up in silence, knowing he has the knowledge to help but unable (or unwilling) to give it. frumpkin is too powerful. frumpkin is the Lexon. frumpkin is artagan. frumpkin is exandria’s detective pikachu.

blog.name: twinvax
blog.description: I write and reblog things for my fandoms. Main focus Critical Role. Feel free to send me asks or general headcanons about characters! I have a critical role rp blog! made and role played for Yeza the halfling (chemistyeza.tumblr.com). Asks open!

summary: The Beauty and the beast story fits Nott fairly well, if Belle was the one who was also the beast.  She was the weird one of her...
body:
The Beauty and the beast story fits Nott fairly well, if Belle was the one who was also the beast. 

She was the weird one of her village, and got turned into a monster, in her own opinion. The true love doesn’t change her, not really, but Yeza loves her either way she is because he loves her no matter what. 

Nott is the beauty as well as the beast, whatever that entails.

summary: New campaign
title: New campaign
body:
Coming soon to a discord server near you: a new 5e DnD campaign run by yours truly. Brand new campaign! New world! New bad guys! New friends! New adventure! Equal parts roleplay and combat and, of course, dungeons aplenty. **Any experience level is fine! Been playing for 20 years, great! Never played before, great also! What’s DnD? The new best thing in your life my friend. Day and time to be decided but will be weekly or every other week.

**due to reasons, i will not be taking anyone under 20 years old, sorry!

Ask me about my homebrew subclasses and races as well, I’ve got some new ones ready to be unleashed!

Note: safe space for all races and lgbt homies.

summary: Favorite part about Mollymauk Tealeaf is that after his death "Long May He Reign" has become synonymous with his character. Like...
body: Favorite part about Mollymauk Tealeaf is that after his death “Long May He Reign” has become synonymous with his character. Like nearly any piece of fan content with him in it is captioned with that, and it’s pretty much treated as the phrase to remember and honor his character by but. That’s literally just what he said after having a threesome. Like he said that to Caleb about himself after having a threesome with a male and female prostitute and Caleb decided to say it at his funeral for some reason. The mourning phrase Mollymauk is famous for is intrinsically tied to him Getting His Dick Wet. Fucking iconic.

tags: knowing my luck this won't appear in any tags... ;_;
also i'm sorry if this is rusty
summary:
Spring Brings Forth Change
Ship: Fjorester
Theme: Day 7 — Seasons
Note: Quite frankly, this piece wasn’t worth the long wait...
body:
Spring Brings Forth Change

  • Ship: Fjorester
  • Theme: Day 7 — Seasons
  • Note: Quite frankly, this piece wasn’t worth the long wait poor @princessamericachavez had to go through. To better explain myself; I hit a really bad burn-out last year and hadn’t been motivated to write until I heard about the Fjorester Week going on. I remembered being half-way finished on this piece and thought, “Why the hell not? Hit two birds with one stone!” I originally wrote this when Molly was still with us, but I edited it slightly to strengthen the piece’s themes. Thank you for your patience and hope you all like it!

Bathed in the dusk of dying twilight, the Mighty Nien had taken refuge within their carriage.

Seven in all, there were (if you included Frumpkin — which you ought to). All of them were weary from the day they were slowly leaving behind. A battle with a nasty owlbear had dampened the mood of the night, leaving the party battered, bruised, and licking their wounds. True, they had slain the beast that had attacked them, but caution was a high priority. No need to take risks when they didn’t need to.

None of them were ready to make gambles again. Not yet.

The violet sky overhead was swiftly consumed by darkness. Fjord watched as, one by one, a canopy of stars materialised out from the black, flickering and glittering like diamonds. But none compared to the moon. It’s ghostly florescence bathed the land in white, foggy light. The large orb’s gaze followed them, watching them like the glistening eye of a god. One neither kind nor cruel.

The party travelled along the forest’s river, following it as the map instructed. Winter was falling away into spring, much like how the day fell for the night. The ice and snow had melted away as they travelled, the ground beneath them slowly turning green once more. The river wound through the forest like a ribbon, welcoming stray flora that grew alongside its borders. From the mud came flowers as golden as sunshine, as fluid as rain. They came at first in ones and twos, yet soon they are the most buoyant of crowds, happily dancing in the wind. The water of the river glistened, mirroring the dazzling assemblage of the moon and stars up above.

  • Click here to read more!

summary:
Caleb took a symbol of the Archeart, when M9 looted the pool in the 
swamp safe house. I completely forgot about that until now,...
body:
Caleb took a symbol of the Archeart, when M9 looted the pool in the swamp safe house. I completely forgot about that until now, as I re-listen my way through C2.

How curious… I don’t recall if anything has come of that since?

… *crafty fingers begin to itch*

… *crafty fingers begin to itch*
trail.content:
Caleb took a symbol of the Archeart, when M9 looted the pool in the swamp safe house. I completely forgot about that until now, as I re-listen my way through C2.

How curious… I don’t recall if anything has come of that since?

… *crafty fingers begin to itch*

summary: I may be in the minority on this, but I think a lot of people are misreading what Beau is trying to do with Caleb.  When she...
body:
I may be in the minority on this, but I think a lot of people are misreading what Beau is trying to do with Caleb. 

When she says that he needs to trust himself more? I take her at her word.

She’s not trying to expose his nefarious plot to travel back in time and erase all of their relationships, oh no, that manipulative bastard.  If she really thought he was going to do that I don’t think she’d hesitate to tell Dairon or Fjord and make concrete moves to clip his wings. 

Nah.  Beau’s trying to get him to admit to himself that this isn’t his plan anymore, if it ever was. That he doesn’t want to do that.  That’s why she’s been pushing him so hard.  And sure, she’s a dick about it sometimes, because she’s Beau, but she’s been extremely patient in keeping Caleb’s secrets while he gets his shit together, so a bit of bluntness isn’t entirely unwarranted. 

Caleb needs to trust that he, himself, is a person who can accomplish positive goals, not some alternate reality Caleb who never suffered the moral stain of killing his parents because Future Caleb intervened.  Beau already knows this. 

When C2 started, never in a million years did I think this friendship would be the main relationship drama in the story.  I just hope that one day Caleb can step up and be a similar friend to Beau.

Nah.  Beau’s trying to get him to admit to himself that this isn’t his plan anymore, if it ever was. When C2 started, never in a million years did I think this friendship would be the main relationship drama in the story.  I just hope that one day Caleb can step up and be a similar friend to Beau.

trail.content:
I may be in the minority on this, but I think a lot of people are misreading what Beau is trying to do with Caleb. 

When she says that he needs to trust himself more? I take her at her word.

She’s not trying to expose his nefarious plot to travel back in time and erase all of their relationships, oh no, that manipulative bastard.  If she really thought he was going to do that I don’t think she’d hesitate to tell Dairon or Fjord and make concrete moves to clip his wings. 

Nah.  Beau’s trying to get him to admit to himself that this isn’t his plan anymore, if it ever was. That he doesn’t want to do that.  That’s why she’s been pushing him so hard.  And sure, she’s a dick about it sometimes, because she’s Beau, but she’s been extremely patient in keeping Caleb’s secrets while he gets his shit together, so a bit of bluntness isn’t entirely unwarranted. 

Caleb needs to trust that he, himself, is a person who can accomplish positive goals, not some alternate reality Caleb who never suffered the moral stain of killing his parents because Future Caleb intervened.  Beau already knows this. 

When C2 started, never in a million years did I think this friendship would be the main relationship drama in the story.  I just hope that one day Caleb can step up and be a similar friend to Beau.
